items.title: This one-and-done heart-disease treatment just got a $1.3 billion endorsement from Eli Lilly
items.description: Verve Therapeutics’ stock was rallying by a record 80% on Eli Lilly’s premium purchase price for the drug-development company.

items.title: How to create a traditional pension — right now
items.description: Annuities are a better deal now than even a few years ago. So why aren’t people buying them?

items.title: My mother-in-law, 95, has $400K in stocks. Would it be smarter taxwise to gift it to her kids — or leave it to them in her will?
items.description: “What is the smartest way to go about this? Will she be taxed?”

items.title: Netflix is setting its sights on the theme-park world, after already taking over TV
items.description: Netflix is moving into the theme-park space with the opening of Netflix House in Philadelphia and Dallas later this year.

items.title: Bye-bye bidding wars: Housing market becomes more buyer-friendly as more sellers slash prices
items.description: For-sale listings are piling up in many real-estate markets in the U.S., according to data from Realtor.com.
